messages.text:
Hello!

Welcome to VIGIL AI, your AI-based home security assistant. I'm here to help you assess and improve your home security.

Getting Started

To begin, I need some information about your home. Could you please tell me your home's location type (urban, rural, or suburban)?

Rural Home Security Assessment

Initial Assessment

You indicated your home is located in a rural area. To provide the best security recommendations, I need some more information. Please tell me the approximate size of your property.

Rural Home Security Assessment

Property Size

You mentioned your home is 1300 square feet. This is a good starting point. To better assess your security needs, I need more information about your property's layout and the number of entry points (doors and windows).

How many doors and windows does your home have? Please specify their locations (e.g., front door, back door, kitchen window).
